General.Name: Beijing Jingxi Culture&Tourism Co Ltd
General.Description: Beijing Jingxi Culture & Tourism Co.,Ltd operates as a film and television entertainment and media company in China. It engages in the production, investment, marketing, and distribution of films, and TV and online dramas; artist brokerage, cultural tourism, media, and other business sectors; tourism project development, investment, and management; tourism information consultation; technology development, consultation, transfer, and services; business and technology promotion; radio and television program production; cultural brokerage business; performance brokerage; organization of cultural and artistic exchange activities; and film and television planning activities. The company is also involved in the real estate development; provision of sports goods, tourism products, exhibition services, conference, market information consulting and research, and animation design services, as well as Chinese cold meat; leasing commercial and office premises; wholesale and leasing of film and television clothing, props, and equipment; film and television props and costume design services; and advertising business. The company was formerly known as Beijing Jingxi Tourism Development Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Beijing Jingxi Culture & Tourism Co.,Ltd in October 2014. Beijing Jingxi Culture & Tourism Co.,Ltd was incorporated in 1997 and is based in Beijing, China.
General.Address: Beijing Cultural Industry Park, Beijing, China, 100102
